movie.title: The Patriarch
movie.description_intro: From the author of "The Whale Rider", a tale of family rivalry and reconciliation, set against the stunning backdrop of rural New Zealand in the 1960s.
movie.description_full: From the author of "The Whale Rider", a tale of family rivalry and reconciliation, set against the stunning backdrop of rural New Zealand in the 1960s.

movies.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
movies.title_english: War for the Planet of the Apes
movies.title_long: War for the Planet of the Apes (2017)
movies.summary: Caesar and his apes are forced into a deadly conflict with an army of humans led by a ruthless Colonel. After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind. As the journey finally brings them face to face, Caesar and the Colonel are pitted against each other in an epic battle that will determine the fate of both their species and the future of the planet.

movies.title: Carré blanc
movies.summary: Philippe lives in a world controlled by a caste system. Those who play the "game" correctly become higher and more powerful. Phillipe plays the game well but his wife wants him to return to reality. Its a love story after marriage.
movies.description_full: Philippe lives in a world controlled by a caste system. Those who play the "game" correctly become higher and more powerful. Phillipe plays the game well but his wife wants him to return to reality. Its a love story after marriage.

movies.title: The Banishment
movies.summary: A trip to the pastoral countryside reveals a dark, sinister reality for a family from the city.
movies.description_full: A trip to the pastoral countryside reveals a dark, sinister reality for a family from the city.
movies.synopsis: A trip to the pastoral countryside reveals a dark, sinister reality for a family from the city.

movies.title: The Mistletoe Promise
movies.summary: Based on the bestselling book by Richard Paul Evans. Two strangers who don't enjoy Christmas meet at work and to avoid being lonely during the holidays make a pact to deal with holiday events together. But as they get to know each other they are able to begin enjoying Christmas. They soon realize that their contract may lead them down a road that neither expected resulting in questionable feelings.
